Coming off the bench for the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. With everything going on, I wanted to play well, Allen Iverson said. "I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here." Last week in San Francisco, Sergio Marchionne told reporters that two corporate structures for Fiat and Chrysler don't make sense after the U.S. automaker goes public. In the next two or three years we will be able to see a single entity. It could be based here in the United States, he was quoted as saying by Italy's Corriere della Sera. Jane Lynch also admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . She explained in an interview with The Sun newspaper: Simon Cowell and Sue say the things people wish they could in their jobs or at their school, but can't because it's not the done thing. "Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop.
